annotations.summary: Patient presents with worsening stomach pain and bloating for three weeks.
Pain in upper abdomen, sometimes migrating to right side.
Intermittent pain worsened by large or fatty meals.
Post-meal nausea, loose stools 3-4 times per week.
Heartburn and burning chest sensation after eating, worse when lying down.
Diet high in fast food, spicy food, coffee, and soda.
Takes daily aspirin and Tums almost daily for two weeks.
Unintentional weight loss of 5 pounds in one month.
